title: I recently took the class 12 examination. Now I am free. How can I earn some money online? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some online source are given below : 1 Data entry. 2 Virtual assistant. 3 Blogging. 4 Affiliate marketing. 5 Social media marketing. 6 E mail marketing. 7 Online trading. 8 Freelancing. 9 You can take online classes. 10 Video editing and photo editing. 11 Yiu should make your YouTube channel. You can choose according to your interest and start earning.
